kandyan.menu: Traditional Kandyan rice and curry, sweets, and tropical fruits.
kandyan.venue: Royal Botanical Gardens, Kandy; historic temples.

hindu.menu: South Indian vegetarian dishes, dosa, sambar, and sweets.
hindu.venue: Temple halls, community centers with traditional decor.

muslim.menu: Halal dishes including biryani, kebabs, and desserts.
muslim.venue: Mosque halls, banquet halls with Islamic motifs.

christian.menu: Western-style buffet, roast meats, salads, and cakes.
christian.venue: Church halls, garden venues with floral decorations.

western.menu: Continental cuisine, wine, and multi-course meals.
western.venue: Hotels, banquet halls, and outdoor gardens.
